sections.title: Cookie Usage
sections.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. Below you can manage your preferences for different purposes.

sections.title: Strictly Necessary Always Enabled
sections.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly. They enable basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas of the website.

sections.title: Functionality
sections.description: These cookies enable enhanced functionality and personalization, such as remembering your preferences and settings.

sections.title: Analytics
sections.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

sections.title: Marketing
sections.description: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites to display relevant advertisements.

sections.title: IAB TCF Vendors
sections.description: The following vendors comply with the IAB Transparency and Consent Framework (TCF). These vendors process your personal data based on your consent choices.

sections.title: Google LLC
sections.description: Processes data for advertising, analytics, and personalization purposes. Privacy Policy

sections.title: Meta Platforms, Inc.
sections.description: Processes data for social media advertising and analytics. Privacy Policy

sections.title: Amazon Advertising
sections.description: Processes data for advertising measurement and targeting. Privacy Policy

sections.title: Google Additional Consent Vendors
sections.description: These vendors are part of Google's Additional Consent mode and operate outside the standard IAB TCF framework.

sections.title: Google Analytics
sections.description: Collects anonymous statistics about how visitors use the website, including page views, session duration, and traffic sources.

sections.title: Google Ads
sections.description: Enables display of personalized advertisements and remarketing campaigns based on your browsing activity.

sections.title: Google Tag Manager
sections.description: A tag management system that allows marketing and analytics tags to be deployed and managed from a single interface.

sections.title: About This Tool
sections.description: This consent management tool allows you to control which cookies and tracking technologies are used on our website. Your choices will be saved and respected on future visits.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.description: Under GDPR and other privacy regulations, you have the right to access, rectify, delete, and port your personal data. You can also object to or restrict certain processing activities.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.description: For any query in relation to our cookie policy and your choices, please contact us.
